text.div:
English

Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition BeModelRadiologyPrescription

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
BeModelRadiologyPrescription 0..*BeModelReferralPrescriptionBeModelRadiologyPrescription

Elements defined in Ancestors:identifier, shortCode, recordedDate, creationDate, patient, author, status, statusReason, careRequested, discipline, description, type, originRequestId, validityStartDate, validityEndDate, problem, bodyLocation
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
priority 1..1CodeableConceptThe priority of the referral or transfer request.
priorityReason 0..1CodeableConceptThe reason for the priority assigned to a referral or transfer request.
additionalInfo 0..*Reference()Additional information that may be needed in the future to act on the request.
previousExams 0..*Reference()Procedures that are related to this referral request.
pssInfo 0..1IdentifierIdentifier of the prescription in the PSS system.
indication 0..*Reference()Indications supporting the referral request.
explanationForRequest 0..1AnnotationExplanation/Justification for the referral.
bodySite 0..*CodeableConceptAnatomical location where the treatment should be applied (for example: 'Left arm').
bodyLaterality 0..1CodeableConceptLaterality of the anatomical location where the treatment should be applied (for example: 'Left').
pssIdentifier 0..*IdentifierIdentifier of the prescription in the PSS system.

name: BeModelRadiologyPrescription

extension.valueString: INAMI/RIZIV

description: Data model for the nursing prescription referral.

element.short: BeModelRadiologyPrescription
element.definition: Data model for the nursing prescription referral.

extension.valueString: Modèle logique de donées de prescription de renvoi.

element.short: Business identifier of the request

extension.valueString: Identifiant business de la demande

element.definition: Business identifier of the request

extension.valueString: Identifiant business de la demande

element.short: Business code allowing the healthcare professional to find a prescription associated with a patient

extension.valueString: Code business permettant au professionnel de santé de retrouver une prescription associée à un patient

element.definition: Business code allowing the healthcare professional to find a prescription associated with a patient

extension.valueString: Code business permettant au professionnel de santé de retrouver une prescription associée à un patient

element.short: Date of recording of the information by the Recorder.

extension.valueString: Date d'enregistrement de l'information par le Recorder

element.definition: Date of recording of the information by the Recorder.

extension.valueString: Date d'enregistrement de l'information par le Recorder.

element.short: Date of creation of the referral prescription

extension.valueString: Date de création de la prescription de renvoi

element.definition: Date of creation of the referral prescription. This date will not change throughout the process. This date corresponds to the first recordedDate recorded for this referral prescription.

extension.valueString: Date de création de la prescription de renvoi. Cette date ne changera pas tout au long du processus. Cette date correspond à la première date d'enregistrement (recordedDate) enregistrée pour cette prescription de renvoi

element.short: Identification of the patient. The unique identifier must be: NISS, National Registry Number or Bis Patient

extension.valueString: Identification du patient. Le numéro unique doit être : NISS, Numéro de registre national ou Bis Patient

element.definition: Is the unique identifier of the patient. The unique identifier must be: NISS, National Registry Number or Bis Patient

element.short: The person who encodes the prescription (e.g. a doctor, nurse, midwife or dentist) and takes responsibility for their content. The unique identifier must be: NISS, National Registry Number or Bis Requester

extension.valueString: La personne qui encode la prescription (par exemple un médecin, une infirmière, une sage-femme ou un dentiste) et qui assume la responsabilité de son contenu. Le numéro unique doit être : NISS, Numéro de registre national ou Bis Requester

element.definition: Is the unique identifier of the person who encodes the prescription (e.g. a doctor, nurse, midwife or dentist) and takes responsibility for their content. The unique identifier must be: NISS, National Registry Number or Bis Requester

extension.valueString: Is the unique identifier of the person who encodes the prescription (e.g. a doctor, nurse, midwife or dentist) and takes responsibility for their content. The unique identifier must be: NISS, National Registry Number or Bis Requester

extension.valueString: Is the status of the referral prescription (e.g. planned, complete, stopped, suspended, in progress, ...)
